text:
“Stay!” Razumihin roared. 

“Listen to me. You’re all babbling idiots! You brood like hens. You’re made of spermaceti ointment! I don’t believe in you!”

Raskolnikov moved to leave.

“Stop! Hear me out! I’m having a housewarming tonight. Come, Rodya. You’re clever but a fool! You’d rather wear out your boots?”

“No.”

“Rubbish! You can’t know! You’ll feel ashamed and come back! Remember, Potchinkov’s house on the third storey…”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin passionately urges Raskolnikov to join him for a gathering, criticizing his isolation and lack of social engagement.
